content.detailedDescription: i was driving from independence to elk city a 12mile drive which takes no longer than 15 minutes. the last thing i remember isthe dollar general store. next thing i know we are in another county at anothercity. james cant remember anything either.  we turned aruond and came back toelk city. the whole trip shouldnt have taken more than 30 minutes.  when welooked at the clock 1 hour and 15 minutes had passed since leaving independence.It feel like the car had been abducted by aliens. i might add that ever since imoved here i have been able to feel them.
content.summary: Believe car was abducted with me in it

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the garden with my husband, my 13 year old son and my sister inlaw.There was a summer thunderstorm, and we were watching it.No rain, a lot oflightning.On our left in a hole in the clouds suddenly a formation of lightballsappeared, flying in a straight line in front of us from left to rightdirection.It/they dissapeared into the clouds after maybe 30 sec.The lightsdidnt move between eachother, as if they were attached to eachother, as if itwas 1 object.They were glowing white really round lights...Different from starsor planes.
content.summary: About 15 light balls flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: At 1:40am on 09/06/01 while looking out my window,i noticed a brilliantly glowing sphere which had three small blinking lightsbehind it in a triangle shape. i raised the window because i couldnt beleive myeyes. as it passed over my house i went out onto my front porch and watched itgo to the south. it sounded like a jet but was traveling sort of slow. at firsti thought it was a meteor,but it had no trail and that is what got me towatching it. if this was a jet it is something very new.
content.summary: Brilliant yellow-white ball flew over house

content.detailedDescription: My family was camping at berlin lake in mahoning co. in ohio (husband, me 3kids)over labor day weekend!! we rode to the playground around 6:00 pm sundayevening. the sky was clear and cloudless. i told my husband it was his turn torun after kids and i went and sat by our bikes. the playground was full of kidsand adults
content.summary: Bright light split into 2 then went to a cigar sha
Saw what appeared initially to be a dark circular.

content.detailedDescription: was traveling south on rt 99 close to fresno ca.Around 245 pm in july of 97 when i saw a silver ball with a dark center appear suddenlyto my right.It then floated over the hwy going right over my vehicle travelingto th northeast,picking up speed at a great rate.I then noticed 2 jets that tookoff from the airport that this thing crossed.The object was still visable 30seconds later when it crossed over the mountains 40 miles to the east with noappearant sonic boom.The 2 jets that took off i lost sight of.The object coverd40 miles in about 30 seconds.Two years later 0n a ufo speacial on tv i saw avideo of the same object that i had observed.I did have a passanger at the timeof the sighting with me but he did not have his glasses.Later on looking at themap it had gone in a direct line twords the nevada test sight outside of lasvegas where i had previously in 1989.
content.summary: Round floating silver ball with dark center
Trapizoid section of sky transitted across entire

content.detailedDescription: we were driving on rt128 heading south just beforert1 exit. noticed a bright object in the sky and first thought it was anairplane.  it was moving very quickly and very bright and had a vapor trail.  itwas heading north-north east.  we saw it for at least 2min.  it didnt appear tohave a strobe light like airplanes do. it moved in what seemed to be a straightflight path and did not appear to change altitude.  it was a steady movement anda section of the vapor trail remained iluminated for at least 10min afterpassing.  it disappeared very quickly in the direction of north-northeast.  waafradion station out of boston had people calling from rhode island and nashua newhampshire stating they saw this also.  the djs reported it as a comet.  we arenot sure what this was.
content.summary: Saw a bright ball of light - maybe a comment cross

content.detailedDescription: in the late summer of 1978 mid september at around6:45,a friend and i saw a huge rectangular object about 30 feet above the powerlines in north bastrop la.My friend pointed it out to me as we were leavinganother freinds house7bwho was not home7d.It was sitting stationary to the north,we were about 50 yds from it.We couldsee a light in the upper left corner ,i could see the left side, front,and partof the bottom.We watched it in awe for it had no wings or propellers and made nosound,it was about 50ft tall and 100ft long.I tried to see the right hand sideand walked over about 15 feet to get a better view,as i did this it began tomove slowly and spiraled up .Upon the 3rd spiral it shot straight up anddissapeared in a matter of seconds.The entire sighting lasted for about 15minutes and it was just starting to get dark.I am certain someone else must haveseen this object due to the size and being close to a main road.I looked in thepaper the next day,but there was no reports.We didnt report this and i amreluctant to talk about it because of the riducule we recieved from our freindsand family.
content.summary: We saw a huge rectangular object

content.detailedDescription: I was at friends ranch house located next to fort hunter-ligget just south ofking city. actual loaction was barr canyon entry spot on topo gps map.There wasa lot of military helicopter activity for two days and when they stopped flyingthis event occurred.  i have seen this before and 2 others with me.  the objectcaught my eye just over head and i watched for about 30 sec.S and it fade to apoint of light in 1 split secong and was gone.  if it took to movement in thismanor i was looking nnw in the direction of the coastline of ca..  it would seemto me that some activity is occuring in this loacl.  if need i would be morethan happy to escort anyone on to privat land that i have access for.  i do muchhunting for big game in this area and i know the region very well. if anyone hasany infor about this i would like to know...Thanks
content.summary: Large orange glow hovering then fades to a bright

content.detailedDescription: This wont be a narrative, just answers to the questions above.1.I was drivingsouth down i-75 after north baltimore and before van buren.2.I just happened toglance out the window and there it was.  i had never  noticed it before, so itcaught my attention.3.I thaught it was an antanae tower of some kind, but thesky was lit rather well by the full moon and i could see no poles or structureof any kind.4.I got off at the next exit, turned and went back north and theobject was gone.5.It was stationary, then it dissappeared.6.It just wasnt thereany more.
content.summary: Saw three red lights in a triangular pattern

content.detailedDescription: witnessed ufos in sky near sky dancer casino at4:00 am august 12. a later report that an object was landed and small humanoidbeings were observed outside the ship. aliens descibed as being black. scene wasleft by witness who went to the casino in a very frightend and agitated state toreport the event.
content.summary: Reporting close encounter of the third kind

content.detailedDescription: Alien abducteepsychic mediumsometimes changes andexperiences that happen in our lives compel us to rethink our lives and the pathwe should follow.For most of my working career i was employed in the financeindustry, however, for all of my life beginning in early childhood, i had manyexperiences nudging me on to other paths.  as a child i was able to see auras,hear
content.summary: Several abductions from age of 7 to present

content.detailedDescription: my son brought this bright light to my attentionin the sky. it looked like a large star. colorful. not moving. i looked at itwith binoculars and could see many different colors. greens, blues, orange, red.We watched for about 20 minutes. eventually moved slightly north, thendisappeared.
content.summary: Color changing object

content.detailedDescription: i was going out my back door to retrieve somethingfrom my car and glanced up at the sky thinking about what a beautiful day it wasgoing to be when i noticed a jet approaching from the east and to the right ofit a metallic starlike object that faded in and out of vision as it caught thesuns reflection.The object passed the jet on the right.  if i could measure itwith a tape measure it would be about 2 inches away from the jet.  it quicklypassed the jet and was last seen about 6-8 inches out in front of the jet andstill to the right. it faded out of sight and i did not see it again.It remindedme of two vehicles on a freeway one quickly over taking the other.The jet hadvisual exhaust the object did not.   thats it, end of story.
content.summary: Metallic object along side of commercial jet.
Nightly seeing starlike objects flying in eractic

content.detailedDescription: While driving east on hwy 94 about 1/2 mile from 94/894 bypass my fiance pointedout a strobing light in the sky, we watched it while it proceded to turn 180degrees and move opposite direction, while turning it seemed to drop about 15degrees lower in the sky.  at the time i thought the object was a helicopteruntil it made the irratic turn.  after thinking about it aircraft lights have aconsistant blinking pattern where this had a strobe like pattern.  after turningon to 41 north my fiance lost track of it behind buildings that were in the lineof sight, and was not able to locate it after that.  if this was truly a ufomany people saw it but since we were headding out of town at the time we wereunable to watch the news that night to see if anything was reported as odd  arethere any type of aircraft that lights strobe?  we are intrested to find out ifanyone else has reported anything similar.
content.summary: Strobe light with irratic movment
Barns airport (, ma) air show - shiny metalic obje

content.detailedDescription: We were returning from a soccer game at foxboro stadium in foxboro,ma.I turnedright at the fork on i93north that leads to boston. about 5 milesdown the road inotices a triangle object float across the highway fromeast to west. my friendwho was sitting next to me in the passenger seat was adjusting the radio. i gothis attention to look up out the front car window. i asked him if that was aairplane? he said i dont this so!.I said to not lose it just follow it with oureyes. the triangle objectpassed over the highway and hovered and turned around.The three lights thatwere there became two and then it just disappeared.
content.summary: Saw a triagle that moved slowly and  vanished.

content.detailedDescription: 1. in house, talking on phone2. thought it was themoon.3. noticed what i thought was the moon had moved to another position.4.Courious, to fear5.Object was luminous and consisted of two oblong bars of lightwhich could have been one or two separate crafts.  it was slightly obscured by astand of trees, made no noise and was stationary.  as i was watching the craftout the cornor of my eye i noticed an entity directly out the window about 100away. it was dimly glowing either emitting light or was illuminated by anunknown light source. it appeared to be standing sideways and bent down severaltimes as if doing something. because it was in a low spot i was unable to seelegs, but it looked at me and its face had one large oriface and other darkspots .  then i heard a swishing sound that went passed the open window and theni noticed another entity next to the house less than 30 away. then everythingseemed to vanish.
content.summary: Encounter of the third kind

content.detailedDescription: at 23:00 hours while we stood on outer sun deck ofour air force barracks observing the night sky looking for aircraft the diskshaped object appeared moving from south to north over naha air base, japan. itlooked perfectly round, made no sound, had no lights and moved at an approx.Speed of 75 to 100 miles-per-hour. with binoculars we observed it on a steadynorthward until it faded out of sight. the sighting lasted approx two minutes.We contacted our control tower about it and the operator said that they didntsee anyhting and after the operator checked with radar he said that they had nocontacts for over one hour. the object reflected city lights over the city ofnaha. we were sure trhat it wasnt any type of conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Twice observed silvery disks over okinawa, japan i

content.detailedDescription: i was lying i bed looking out window.2 in thenight,just turned off t.V.Then a light blinking on one sec then off for two secstarts across my view from right side of window.At first i thougt copter, then ithought car on mountain road when there was no sound.Bedroom window wide open.Itwas hot that night.It was too big to be airplane light.I thought it washighbeams.In morning i realized that the mountain was way below myline of sight.The thing was almost a mile in sky,but it looked like highbeams of car about 75yards away.I could tell the object was about 3 blocks away in distance.Straightline and abouthalf mile up. i heard no sound, no dogs, nothing.It caught me offguard.I should have gone to window to see how and where it went.At the time iwas sure it was car, but the mountains are so far that the light would be afaint dot.
content.summary: Blinking,moving slow bright light.No sound
